text.author: Wikipedia, The Free Encyclopedia
text.title: Patrick Gordon
text.summary: Patrick Gordon was a 17th Century General and Rear Admiral of Scottish origin in the Russian Army, who was also a close friend and advisor of Tsar Peter the Great.
